title: Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus Review: 5 Things I Like (And 2 I Don’t) - Forbes
CES 2025: LG unveils new Gram series AI PCs - Deccan Herald
summary:
LG Unveils New Gram Series AI PCs at CES 2025

Published: 01 January 2025, 12:28 IST - Source: Deccan Herald

LG has announced its new Gram series AI PCs, set to debut at CES 2025 in Las Vegas next week. The series includes four variants: Gram Book, Gram Pro, Gram Pro 17-inch, and Gram Pro 2-in-1.

  • The Gram Book features a 15.6-inch full HD display, Intel Core i5 processor, and up to 1TB SSD storage.
  • The Gram Pro sports a 16-inch WQXGA LCD display with peak brightness of 400nits, Intel Core Ultra processors, and up to 2TB Gen4 NVMe storage.
  • The Gram Pro 17-inch model features the same display and connectivity ports as the smaller model, with four 3.0W stereo speakers and Intel Core Ultra processors.
  • The Gram Pro 2-in-1 is available in two 16-inch screen variants, with Intel Core Ultra processors and up to 2TB Gen4 NVMe storage.

The new laptops will be showcased at CES 2025 and will hit global markets, including India, later in the year.
newTitle: LG Unveils New Gram Series AI PCs at CES 2025

title: Apple’s latest iPhone could copy from Samsung for a change - SamMobile - Samsung news
summary:
Apple’s iPhone could copy from Samsung for a change

Published on: January 1st, 2025 at 13:15 UTC+01:00 Source: Sammobile

Apple fans have long accused Samsung of copying their favorite brand, but now it seems the tables are turning. Rumors suggest that Apple is developing an affordable iPhone, the iPhone 16E, inspired by Samsung's FE series.

Key Points

  1. The iPhone 16E is rumored to have specs more suitable for its price range but may also feature the Action Button, currently limited to Apple's flagship iPhones.
  2. Samsung's FE series has seen success with devices like the Galaxy S23 FE, Galaxy Buds FE, and Galaxy Tab S9 FE and S9+ FE.
  3. Apple's iPhone SE lineup has laid the groundwork for catering to a more price-conscious segment.

“That's the formula that Samsung has perfected with its FE series... It's now realizing that growth is slowing down in the premium segment, so more value must be derived elsewhere through providing the right mix of functionality and affordability.”

Sammobile

Conclusion

Apple's rumored move to introduce an affordable iPhone inspired by Samsung's FE series suggests a shift in strategy to cater to a broader range of customers.
newTitle: Apple's iPhone 16E: Following Samsung's FE Strategy

summary:
Samsung Galaxy S25 series: One UI 7 may feature Gemini Live on lock screen

Published on: Jan 01 2025 | Source: Business Standard

Samsung is reportedly planning a deeper integration of Google Gemini AI on its Galaxy smartphones with the new Android 15-based One UI 7 user interface. The new interface will utilize a feature called the Now Bar on the lock screen.

  • The Now Bar will work like a lock screen widget with quick access to personalized actions and frequently used apps.
  • Gemini Live will offer a human-like conversational experience with the AI assistant, featuring phone-call-style controls on the lock screen.
  • New Gemini Extensions for native Galaxy apps will allow the AI assistant to perform functions within apps like Samsung Calendar and Samsung Notes.
  • Users may have the option to switch from the native Bixby assistant to Google Gemini.
  • Samsung might provide additional Gemini Advanced subscriptions with purchases of Galaxy S25 series smartphones.
“The base Galaxy S25 could get three months of Gemini Advanced subscription for no additional cost.”

This integration aims to enhance user experience by providing more functionality and ease of use via AI-powered tools on Samsung devices.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series to Feature Gemini Live on Lock Screen with One UI 7

Apple is rumored to expand its ProMotion display technology to all models of the upcoming iPhone 17, moving away from the traditional 120Hz refresh rate exclusive to Pro models.

  • All iPhone 17 models may feature the high-refresh-rate ProMotion display.
  • LTPO panels could replace LTPS panels used in previous models, allowing for smoother visuals.
  • Rumors suggest an anti-reflective display that may be more scratch-resistant than current models.
  • The expected launch is set for September 2025.
“The LTPO panels would not only support a high refresh rate but also offer always-on display capabilities.”

While the enhancements are exciting, confirmation from Apple is pending as the launch date approaches.

title: Next OnePlus Watch to get ECG and more health features: What to expect - Business Standard
summary:

OnePlus is reportedly working on advanced health features for the third-generation OnePlus Watch, according to a recent report by Android Authority. The upcoming smartwatch is expected to introduce Electrocardiogram (ECG), skin temperature measurement, and other features.

  1. ECG and Atrial Fibrillation Detection
  2. Wrist Temperature Measurement
  3. 60-Second Check-up Feature
  4. Potential 'OnePlus Watch 3 Pro' Model
  5. Expected Specs: Qualcomm Snapdragon W5, 2GB RAM, 32GB Storage
According to the report, the new OnePlus OHealth app now mentions 'OnePlus Watch 3' and 'OnePlus Watch 3 Pro' among the list of supported devices.

The company may launch the next-generation smartwatch around the same time as the OnePlus Watch 2, which was released in March 2024.

The Poco X7 5G series is all set to launch in India on January 9, featuring the Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G models. The devices will be available on Flipkart, showcasing exciting design elements and robust specifications.

GTA 6, Nintendo's New Console, and Esports Olympics: What to Expect in 2025 Gaming

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Economic Times

The year 2025 is poised to be transformative for the gaming industry, with major releases expected to shape its future. Following a difficult 2024, hope is on the horizon with anticipated releases like GTA 6 and a new Nintendo console.

  • GTA 6: The highly anticipated game from Rockstar Games is expected to release in autumn 2025, featuring dual protagonists in a Florida-inspired setting.
  • Nintendo's New Console: Expected by the end of March 2025, it will be compatible with existing Switch games and aims to enhance processing power while maintaining compatibility.
  • Independent Games: Indie games are expected to continue gaining traction despite challenges in discoverability.
  • Esports Olympics: The first Olympic Esports Games will take place in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia in 2025, marking a significant inclusion of esports in the Olympic movement.
“I think it's an important moment because the Olympic movement has traditionally not been too keen on esports.” - George Osborn

The events of 2025 will mark significant advancements in the gaming industry, with the potential to reshape its landscape through major game releases and the introduction of esports into the Olympics.

title: Anant Ambani's fitness trainer, Vinod Channa, shares 3 ways to reduce belly fat - India.com
summary:
Anant Ambani's fitness trainer, Vinod Channa, shares 3 ways to reduce belly fat

Published Date: N/A Source: India.com

Vinod Channa, the fitness trainer who assisted Anant Ambani in his notable weight loss journey, provides three key strategies to effectively reduce belly fat.

How to Reduce Belly Fat in 3 Steps?

  1. Eat at regular intervals: Channa emphasizes the importance of regular eating to keep metabolism active without stressing the intestinal system.
  2. Work on abs at the right time: The optimal time for abs workouts is after larger muscle exercises to maximize calorie burn.
  3. Work on all muscle groups: Target all major abdominal muscles for comprehensive results.

Channa also stresses that each individual's weight loss journey is unique and tailored nutrition plans are essential.

About Vinod Channa

Vinod Channa is a highly sought-after celebrity fitness trainer known for his holistic approach to fitness and nutrition.
newTitle: Vinod Channa's Tips for Reducing Belly Fat
